description: Name of the workgroup associated with this compensation rule in fleet operations; likely denotes the business unit or program used for organizing time and pay; confirm with SME.
Classification of compensation used in payroll and timekeeping for employees within the associated workgroup, driving pay rates and accrual rules.
User ID of the person or system that created this record for compensation configuration.
Timestamp when the compensation record was created, in system time.
User ID of the person or system that last modified this compensation record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to this compensation record.
